Title: The Diamond Arm
Writer: Moris Slobodskoy (screenplay by), Yakov Kostyukovskiy (screenplay by), Leonid Gaidai (screenplay by)
Actors: Yuriy Nikulin, Nina Grebeshkova, Andrey Mironov, Anatoliy Papanov
Plot: An ordinary Soviet citizen accidentally intervenes into the huge operation of international criminal group that trades illegally obtained jewelry.
